response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. The value of this product to me exceeds $1,200,000, but considering its importance and potential impact on your business, I am willing to extend an exclusive offer. I propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding the right owner who can fully appreciate and utilize the product's capabilities. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and interests. I look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 950000}
